silent_description: If this field is set to true, script will output full data in PowerShell terminal.
core_select_description: Define desired chip core for custom parameter run as string.(i.e "STM32_M0","STM32_M3", etc.)
chip_regex_description: Define custom chip regex for chip inclusion as string. (i.e "(^STM32(F|L|G)0(.+)$)" -- will select all STM32(F,L,G)0xxx chips for build.)
